com.codeferm.dbaccess.transaction

Class TransactionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codeferm.dbaccess.transaction.TransactionFactory

  • public final class TransactionFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple factory class that returns and Object with methods wrapped in a transaction if the method is annotated with Transaction. The method interceptor null AtomikosTransInterceptor, QueryRunnerTransInterceptor or JdbcTransInterceptor is binded with Guice using AtomikosTransModule.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    sgoldsmith
    See Also:
    Transaction, AtomikosTransInterceptor, AtomikosTransModule

      Create object of type T wrapped in transaction.

      • createObject

        public static <T> T createObject(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                 java.lang.Class<? extends com.google.inject.AbstractModule> transModule)
        Create object of type T wrapped in transaction.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Return type.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Type of object to create.

        Wrapped object.
